data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_2',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_2,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_2)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_2"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_2,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_2,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_5',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_5,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_5)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_5"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_5,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Cold_5,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning)"

type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Poison',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Poison,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Poison)"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Poison"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Poison,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Poison,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Thunder_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Thunder_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_HideousLaughter_2,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_HideousLaughter_2,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_CrownOfMadness_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_CrownOfMadness_3)"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_CrownOfMadness_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_CrownOfMadness_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_CrownOfMadness_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_MagicWeapon',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_MagicWeapon,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_MagicWeapon)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_MagicWeapon,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_MagicWeapon,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_PhantasmalForce_3',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_PhantasmalForce_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_PhantasmalForce_3)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_PhantasmalForce_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_PhantasmalForce_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_PhantasmalForce_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "Passive_Trigger_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Passive_Trigger_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Strength,100,0);ApplyStatus(STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0)"

data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Constitution',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Constitution,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Constitution)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Constitution"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Constitution,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Constitution,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Wisdom,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Ability_Wisdom,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_BestowCurse_Attack',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_BestowCurse_Attack,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Attack)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_BestowCurse_Attack"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Attack,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_BestowCurse_Attack,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "PassiveData"

data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire,100,0);ApplyStatus(STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0)"

type "SpellData"
data "SpellType" "Shout"
using "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire"
data "PowerLevel" "4"
data "RootSpellID" "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire"
data "SpellProperties" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and HasWeaponInMainHand()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and not (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,OffHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Fire_4,100,10);"
data "TooltipAttackSave" ""
data "TooltipDamageList" ""

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Thunder,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_ProtectionFromEnergy_Thunder,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"
